comments: Loved these classes. I took both of her classes and I liked them both. Sierra is an amazing teacher.Do yourself a favor and take her courses.

Dr. Sierra is amazing she is an expert in Latino politics and active scholar. Come prepared by reading and thinking through the material. Much of her discussions come from textbook charts and graphs. Sierra\'s classes have been life changing and I respect her work and dedication to the class.

This professor is awful. She talks about herself as if she\'s some prodigy. Doesn\'t cover material on exams & expects you to print out 80+ page articles each week. Awful communication & isn\'t open for any negotiation. DO NOT TAKE THIS COURSE!!!

Don\'t miss her class! Read the material she assigns!!! She loves discussion so be ready to participlate she will challenge your answers. Great class! Interesting topic! Easy exams!! Material covered in class is more important than textbook.

Seems very in touch with students who have a political background or are tied to her roots. I also noticed she loved to talk about herself and her experience. Tests were awful and not stuff we had discussed, doesn\'t discuss readings, and takes longer than most profs to respond to emails.

Awful professor-is rude and unprofessional in her communicaiton with students students, is greviously underqualified to be in academia, does not answer emails and assigns outrageously pricey books which are of subpar quality. Seek a more engaged and competent professor in the political science department

She is honestly not as bad as some of the comments here paint her to be. She is a great professor and her lectures are interesting but I agree that sometimes it seems too simple. I never had to study for an exam, but at the same time several people would fail them so I understand why she is hesitant to make the class more rigorous.

Professor Sierra is very knowledgeable, and clearly has an interest in her topic. Its great that we dont read off of the book. She\'s willing to help and takes the time to listen, overall very easy class. Would def recommend.

The last posting is right. She is extremely unorganized as far as teaching. She picks random chapters from the text, out of order, and sprinkles them throughout the syllabus. None of it makes sense. Then, she goes off on tangets, failing to instruct, and then expects the class to know things that are not in the book or her lecture. She\'s horrible.

She is not a very fair instructor. There\'s a very anti-white, racial undertone in the class. Her test questions are crazy from left-field, and she expects everyone to know things she never covered, at all. Also, she tell you when you\'re allowed to go to the bathroom. RUN RUN RUN
